resources.string: While you wait, why not check out myTBA?
myTBA lets you track your favorite things in FRC and receive notifications for match scores, event winners, and more.
You can mark teams, events, matches, and more as favorites for easy access.
You can subscribe to a variety of notifications, such as upcoming matches for a team or the winners of an event.
You can use myTBA anywhere you see this yellow button.
Ready to get started with myTBA?
Sign in with your Google account so we can save and sync your data.
Your device is missing Google Play Services, so myTBA is not supported.
The app has been updated to a new version. Click \"Next\" to download some important new data.
While you wait, check out some of the recent improvements to the app.
You\'re all set! Enjoy the app.
No internet connection was found. Check your connection and try again.
Your internet connection was interrupted. Check your connection and try again.
FIRST is currently experiencing technical difficulties updating data, please check back later.
This event does not currently have live data available. Please check back later.
Well, this is really bad. We don\'t know what happened. If you want, you can contact the developer with the error information.
Do you want to enable myTBA?
You can always enable it later in Settings.
